Articles.title: First Post
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text: So, I'm working on this angular app to show all my blog post from this json file. If you see this then, it's working.

Articles.title: Site Updates
Articles.author: Christopher Bell
Articles.text:
So I consider the new blog as a major upgrade to the site. Anyone who has visited before knows the vastness of this barren wasteland in terms of content. 
 I plan on making many more major upgrades to the site. It's mostly a matter of when the planning phases of these projects will complete that will decide when they are released, but you all can expect to see something new before the end of the year.
